listitem.para: Enable the use of the draft 96-bit trunacted hash (instead of the 128-bit truncated has specified in the final RFC) when negotiating &ESP; with esp=sha2_256.
This option is required when interoperating with &Linux;, before 2.6.33, and some &Cisco; routers (2811?).
Another workaround is to switch from sha2_256 to sha2_512.
